ygData.messageBody:
At 02:38 PM 5/28/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>Druids have some nifty damage shield spells. These are the
>kind that do damage to the attacker every time you're hit.
>Since bards often end up being the mob magnet, I was wondering
>if anyone had tried getting a druid to cast a couple of these
>on you (there are two types - one low damage/long duration,
>one high damage/short duration, both stack - cast the latter
>just as a fight starts).

I've had a lot of luck doing that - I was fighting muddites in Beholder
Maze, tanking with another bard, a druid, a cleric, a wizard, and a rogue.
The Druid cast Brambles on me right as a gorge mino, muddite minor and
muddite elder all decided I was cannon fodder. I was very fortunate to
have quick-response medical help, as well as some really buff magic. WE
killed them all - but sadly, I was the only one who had taken any damage.

Talies the Wanderer
